statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ -2 \\ 1 \\ -3 \\ 2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ -3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 20 \\ 30 \\ 10 \\ 20 \\ 5 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 1 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 0 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
